column1: #Trump administration paying for uninsured that need to be checked for #Corona virus infection. #Socialism? There is a group of people who cannot afford healthcare, that is why the #affordablecareact came into play. Now it is ALSO some people trying to be a #parasite to society.

Unfortunately this is not an uncommon point of view. "You haven't experienced it so you can't have an opinion on it." 
I assume if any of these people get coronavirus they won't take advice from a doctor unless he or she has experienced the disease first hand ...
